details.title: A LOS rate estimation method for bank-to-turn missiles
details.abstract: We compensate for the effect of the fast roll motion of bank-to-turn (BTT) missiles through appropriate coordinate transformation. Thereby, the proposed line-of-sight (LOS) rate estimator can provide better estimation performance than the previously known passive target tracking methods since it is independent of seeker-stabilization loop and robust with the measurement noise.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
